entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
